title: League Bug
body: when i updated the game for patch 6.16 My game started to Crash everytime after champions select  .. is it only me or for everyone ?? i got 3 , 20min afk  queue penalty on a row because of that wth am i supposed to do ?? please fix it if it's a bug or something

replies.body: I've seen a few reports of this, and the culprit appears to be third party programs interacting with league and causing it to crash.  If you have any apps like play.tv or overwolf, remove them and try again.  Hopefully, that will get you fixed up!

I'm having the exact same problem it demoted, me from G5 to S1 from all the crashes because I thought it was from my computer at first, but after going getting my laptop repaired I still crashed so it must be the client.

Does your screen freeze to on the last thing you were doing on league, and not blue screen at all as well?
